detail.reasoning: The given text states that Mexico faces obesity issues more than Ireland. According to the provided evidences, Mexico has an obesity rate of 36.09% (as per one evidence) and 32.22% (as per another evidence), while Ireland has an obesity rate of 30.84% and 25.3% according to different evidences. Despite the slight variations in the exact percentages, all evidences consistently show that Mexico's obesity rate is higher than Ireland's. Therefore, the statement in the text is supported by the evidences.
